mapper.sql: id , car_vin, car_brand, car_series, car_series_name, car_model, car_model_code, car_model_name, engine, engine_no, is_vip, owner_id, invoice_photo, invoice_no, identity_card, organization, car_number, terminal_id, auto_terminal, create_time, update_time, sales_date, T_ID, MB_SALES_STATUS, MB_SALES_DATE, SALES_STATUS, tbox_type
mapper.select: SELECT uu.uc_id AS userId FROM flt_fleet_car_mapping fcm LEFT JOIN flt_fleet_user_mapping fum ON fum.team_id = fcm.team_id LEFT JOIN car cc ON cc.id = fcm.car_id LEFT JOIN user uu ON uu.id = fum.user_id WHERE cc.car_vin = #{chassisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fum.role IN (0, 1) UNION SELECT uu.uc_id AS userId FROM flt_car_driver_mapping cdm LEFT JOIN car cc ON cc.id = cdm.car_id LEFT JOIN user uu ON uu.id = cdm.user_id WHERE cc.car_vin = #{chassisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT uu.uc_id AS userId FROM flt_car_owner_mapping com LEFT JOIN car cc ON cc.id = com.car_id LEFT JOIN user uu ON uu.id = com.user_id WHERE cc.car_vin = #{chassisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id, car_vin as carVin, car_number AS carNumber FROM car WHERE car_vin like CONCAT('%', #{chassisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT c.car_vin AS carVin, c.car_number AS carNumber, CONCAT(mi.driver_type_name, mi.car_type_name) AS carModelName, mi.simple_name AS carSeriesName, mi.engine AS engine, c.auto_terminal AS autoTerminal FROM car c LEFT JOIN model_info mi ON mi.model_id = c.car_model where c.auto_terminal = #{terminalId} limit 1
select IFNULL(MIN(TER.T_STYLE), 8) FROM ${DbName}.hy_terminal TER, ${DbName}.hy_car C WHERE C.CAR_TERMINAL = TER.T_ID AND C.CHASSIS_NUM = #{chassisNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id, car_model_base AS carModelBase, car_number AS carNumber FROM car WHERE car_vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1
SELECT id AS carId, car_vin AS carVin, auto_terminal AS terId FROM car WHERE auto_terminal = #{autoTerminal, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY CAST(id AS signed) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ftl.user_id AS userId FROM flt_car_owner_mapping ftl INNER join car c on ftl.car_id = c.id WHERE c.car_vin like CONCAT('%', #{vin}, '%')
SELECT ftl.user_id AS userId FROM flt_car_owner_mapping ftl INNER join car c on ftl.car_id = c.id WHERE c.car_vin like CONCAT('%', #{vin}, '%')

SELECT ftl.user_id AS userId FROM flt_car_owner_mapping ftl INNER join car c on ftl.car_id = c.id INNER JOIN flt_fleet_user_mapping ffum ON ftl.user_id = ffum.user_id WHERE c.car_vin like CONCAT('%', #{vin}, '%') AND role = 0
